answers.answer: DOES HE HAVE RESTLESS LEG SYNDROME BECAUSE MY LEGS DO THAT SOMETIMES AND MAYBE HE SHOULD GET CHECKED OUT OF DIABETES JUST TO BE SAFE!!!!!!!

question: My husband told me that his left leg felt "like it was burned" and felt like it was "caught in a cactus patch all the way to the bottom of my foot and all around my lower leg.  It has felt like this the last three days."  His PA-C told him to just take it easy.  His medical history consists of asthma, a hernia that has not been repaired and, when he was a police officer, he had a gunshot wound to the chest; however that injury is more than 15 years old.  Any suggestions?This discussion is related tohttp://www.medhelp.org/posts/show/227939.
title: Burning sensation in leg
